allow:

- Fixed AdminCreateProductWizard: changed mockupStyle and background types
- Fixed AIJob type to include ''replicate_rembg'' job type
- Fixed RealisticMockupGenerator: corrected button disabled logic
- Fixed AdminDashboard: updated productAssets type to support complex assets
- Fixed stripe-itc: added type assertion for PaymentIntent metadata

)")
Bash(powershell -Command "Get-Process -Name node -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Where-Object {$_Path -like ''*imagine-this-printed*''} | Select-Object Id, ProcessName | Format-List")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add Imagination Station - AI-powered gang sheet builder

New Features:
- Full gang sheet design tool for DTF, UV DTF, and Sublimation printing
- AI-powered tools: Mr. Imagine (image generation), Nano Banana (BG removal, upscaling)
- Real-time canvas editor with Konva.js drag-and-drop
- ITC token-based pricing with free trials for new users
- Auto-layout features: auto-nest and smart fill
- Export to PNG/PDF at 300 DPI with cutlines option

Frontend (13 new components):
- src/pages/ImaginationStation.tsx - Main page
- src/components/imagination/* - Canvas, sidebars, panels

Backend:
- backend/routes/imagination-station.ts - API endpoints
- backend/services/imagination-pricing.ts - ITC pricing service
- backend/services/imagination-ai.ts - Replicate AI integration
- backend/config/imagination-presets.ts - Sheet presets

Database:
- 4 new Supabase tables with RLS policies
- Default pricing: bg_remove (5), upscale (5-10), generate (15), etc.

Also fixes TypeScript errors across multiple files:
- Header.tsx: pointsBalance â†’ itcBalance
- UserProfile.tsx: wallet access, JSX namespace
- UserProductCreator.tsx: pointsBalance fix
- VoiceConversationEnhanced.tsx: MediaTrackConstraints
- Community.tsx: encodeURIComponent fallbacks

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add stability features and fixes to Imagination Station

Stability Features:
- ErrorBoundary wrapper for graceful error handling
- Autosave every 30 seconds when changes are unsaved
- Undo/Redo with 50-entry history (Ctrl+Z, Ctrl+Shift+Z, Ctrl+Y)
- Undo/Redo buttons in top toolbar

Bug Fixes:
- ITP Enhance buttons (Remove BG, Upscale, Enhance) now have onClick handlers
- Mr. Imagine AI generation calls actual API instead of placeholder alert
- AI-generated images now include created_at timestamp

Admin Features:
- New ITC Pricing tab in Admin Dashboard
- Adjust ITC costs per feature
- Set promotional pricing (all free for X hours)
- Reset pricing to defaults

Files changed:
- src/pages/ImaginationStation.tsx - stability features, AI fixes
- src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx - ITC Pricing tab
- src/lib/api.ts - admin API methods
- backend/routes/admin/imagination-pricing.ts - new pricing routes
- backend/index.ts - route registration
- src/utils/dpi-calculator.ts - DPI quality calculations
- src/components/imagination/ - ITPEnhanceTools, AddElementPanel

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix: support GCS_CREDENTIALS JSON string for Railway deployment

Modified gcs-storage.ts to parse credentials from either:
- GCS_CREDENTIALS env var (JSON string for cloud deployment)
- GCS_CREDENTIALS_PATH env var (file path for local dev)
- Application default credentials as fallback

EOF
)")
Bash(timeout 15 bash -c 'cd """"e:/Projects for MetaSphere/imagine-this-printed"""" && railway logs')
